Package model

Class Photo

java.lang.Object
model.Photo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Photo extends Object implements Serializable
Internal data structure that backs a photo

  • Field Details

    • serialVersionUID

      private static final long serialVersionUID
      Needed for serializing
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • tags

      private Map<String,​ArrayList<String>> tags
      A mapping of tag keys to tag values. Each Tag key can have multiple tag values, thus we map a string to an array list of strings

    • date

      private LocalDate date
      The last modification date of the photo

    • filePath

      private String filePath
      The absolute path to the photo in the filesystem

    • caption

      private String caption
      The caption/name of the photo

  • Constructor Details

    • Photo

      public Photo​(File f)
      Creates a new photo that is backed by some file in the file system
      Parameters:
      f - The file reference to the photo

  • Method Details

    • getCaption

      public String getCaption()
      Get the caption of a photo
      Returns:
      The caption

    • setCaption

      public void setCaption​(String caption)
      Sets the caption of a photo
      Parameters:
      caption - The new caption of the photo

    • getTagKeys

      public Iterator<String> getTagKeys()
      Gets all the tag keys within a photo
      Returns:
      An iterator of all the tag keys of a photo

    • getTagValues

      public Iterator<String> getTagValues​(String tagKey)
      Gets all the tag values for a given tag key
      Parameters:
      tagKey - The tag key to look at it's values
      Returns:
      An iterator of all the tag values for a given tag key

    • removeTagPair

      public void removeTagPair​(String tagKey, String tagVal)
      Removes a tag pair from a photo. If the tag key only has one value, the entire key is removed from the photo.
      Parameters:
      tagKey - The key of the pair
      tagVal - The value of the pair

    • removeTag

      public void removeTag​(String tagKey)
      Removes a tag key from a photo
      Parameters:
      tagKey - The key to remove

    • tagPairExists

      public boolean tagPairExists​(String tagKey, String tagVal)
      Checks to see if a tag pair exists
      Parameters:
      tagKey - The key to check for
      tagVal - The value to check for
      Returns:
      True if the tag pair exists, false otherwise

    • addTagPair

      public void addTagPair​(String tagKey, String tagVal)
      Adds a tag pair to a photo. Silently discards duplicates.
      Parameters:
      tagKey - The key we are going to be adding a new value
      tagVal - The new tag value

    • getPath

      public String getPath()
      Gets the file path to the photo
      Returns:
      The file path

    • getLocalDate

      public LocalDate getLocalDate()
      Gets the last modification time of the photo
      Returns:
      Time of the photo

    • getDateAsString

      public String getDateAsString()
      Gets the last modification time of the photo as a simple date of the form: MM/DD/YYYY
      Returns:
      The date as a string

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Object o)
      Checks to see if two photos are equal
